Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Wizard Feats: Class Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Improved Familiar Attunement: Familiar is the focus of Arcane Bond and has 4 additional abilities
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 100 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +25 (dexterity; trained) Intimidation: +24 (charisma; untrained) Scouting Lore: +27 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +31 (intelligence; master) Legal Lore: +27 (intelligence; trained) Sky Lore: +27 (intelligence; trained)
Astronomy Lore: +27 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Society: +25 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +26 (strength; trained) Mining Lore: +27 (intelligence; trained) Stabling Lore: +33 (intelligence; legendary)
Crafting: +29 (intelligence; expert) Nature: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +23 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +28 (charisma; expert) Occultism: +27 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)

Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Legal Lore): Skill Trained (Legal Lore)
Skill Training (Survival): Skill Trained (Survival)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 7 from any)
Assurance (Farming Lore): Can take an automatic 38 on Farming Lore checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 4 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Knowledge Is Power: Critical success to Recall Knowledge about a creature inflicts -1 attack and saves vs. next self attack and -1 attack or DC on next attack vs. self within 1 min; sharing the knowledge with allies extends the effects to them
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Magical Shorthand: Can learn new spells with 10 min of study and retry 1 week after a failure, and can learn new spells at a discounted cost
Quick Recognition: Can use a skill with master proficiency to Recognize Spell as a free action once per rd
Recognize Spell: (R) Successful roll of the connected skill gives recognition of a spell; critical success also gives +1 against effects, and critical failure misidentifies it; trained, expert, master, or legendary proficiency guarantees success on spells up to rank 2, 4, 6, or 10
Spellbook Prodigy: Critical failures to Learn A Spell are normal failures
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Arctic): +1 Survival in Arctic
Terrain Expertise (Swamp): +1 Survival in Swamp
Terrain Expertise (Underground): +1 Survival in Underground
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 37 (dexterity; expert) Class DC: Wizard: 37 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+27 1 P R20'; dexterity; expert); Crossbow (+27 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Heavy Crossbow (+27 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry (Shield Spikes): Weapon Familiarity (Shield Spikes)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Bespell Strikes: (F) Casting a non-cantrip spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +27 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Prodigious Will: Save Master (Will)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Prodigious Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: A10: 2; A1: 9; A2: 9; A3: 9; A4: 9; A5: 9; A6: 9; A7: 9; A8: 9; A9: 9; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane Innate: +32 (charisma; legendary); Arcane: +33 (intelligence; legendary) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 42 (charisma; legendary); Arcane: 43 (intelligence; legendary)
Spells:
Charming Push (A1 Foc): (1) Prevents target from using hostile actions vs. self for 1 rd (save Will inflicts -1 attack and damage vs. self; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1)
Community Restoration (A4 Foc): (R) Casting a spell on an ally gives self 2 temporary Hit Points per spell rank, plus an equal number to distribute among affected allies, for 1 min
Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-rank illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the level or rank of the most powerful effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the most powerful effect)
Earthworks (A1 Foc): (1) 60' 5' burst (using 2 or 3 actions gives a 10' or 15' burst) inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened 4th inflicts difficult terrain for flying creatures)
Energy Absorption (A4 Foc): (R) Gives resistance 15 to the triggering acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage (heightened +1 gives +5 resistance)
Force Bolt (A1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4+1 HP)
Fortify Summoning (A1 Foc): (1) R30' Summoned creature gains +1 checks, Armor Class, and DCs for 1 min
Hand Of The Apprentice (A1 Foc): (1) Spell attack while throwing a melee weapon inflicts its base damage + 5, or double HP and the weapon's critical specialization effect on a critical success; the weapon returns afterwards
Interdisciplinary Incantation (A4 Foc): (R) R30' Allows replicating another creature's triggering arcane spell until the end of the next turn once per 24 hr
Invisibility Cloak (A4 Foc): (2) Self becomes invisible for 1 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 6th effects last for 10 min; 8th effects last for 1 hr)
Protective Wards (A1 Foc): (1) 5' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class while sustained for up to 1 min; each sustain increases the radius by 5' up to 30'
Rune Of Observation (A4 Foc): (1) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 1 hr; spending Focus Points extends the spell for 1 hr each
Scramble Body (A1 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts sickened 1 (save Fortitude negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1 while sickened)
Shifting Form (A4 Foc): (1) Gives self a choice of +20 Speed, 12' climb or swim Speed, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, or claws that inflict 1d8 HP slashing, for 1 min
Spiral Of Horrors (A4 Foc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts irreducible frightened 1 while sustained for up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Advanced School Spell (School Of Ars Grammatica): Knows the Rune Of Observation arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of Battle Magic): Knows the Energy Absorption arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of Civic Wizardry): Knows the Community Restoration arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of Mentalism): Knows the Invisibility Cloak arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of Protean Form): Knows the Shifting Form arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of The Boundary): Knows the Spiral Of Horrors arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (School Of Unified Magical Theory): Knows the Interdisciplinary Incantation arcane spell
Arcane School: Has a focus pool
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 3rd rank at will
Archwizard's Might: +1 10th rank spell slot
Archwizard's Spellcraft: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Arcane)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Arcane)
School Of Ars Grammatica: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Protective Wards arcane spell
School Of Battle Magic: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Force Bolt arcane spell
School Of Civic Wizardry: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Earthworks arcane spell
School Of Mentalism: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Charming Push arcane spell
School Of Protean Form: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Scramble Body arcane spell
School Of The Boundary: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Fortify Summoning arcane spell
School Of Unified Magical Theory: Knows the Hand Of The Apprentice arcane spell
Bond Conservation: (1) Preceding Drain Bonded Item leaves enough power to cast another spell 2 ranks lower by the end of the next turn
Bonded Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Call Wizardly Tools: (1) Teleports bonded item or spellbook within 1 mile to self
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Clever Counterspell: Can attempt a Counterspell vs. a known spell using any spell that shares with it a trait other than concentrate, manipulate, or a tradition
Conceal Spell: (1) Casts a subsequent spell without an incantation or obvious manifestations
Convincing Illusion: (R) R30' Successful Deception vs. Perception changes a normal success to disbelieve a self illusion into a failure
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Curriculum Spells: Automatically adds school-specified spells to spellbook
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Energy Ablation: (1) Casting a spell that inflicts energy damage gives self resistance to a chosen energy type equal to the spell rank until the end of the next turn
Experimental Spellshaping: Can choose 1 spellshape feat of up to level 10 to use each day during daily prep
Explosive Arrival: (F) Subsequent summoning inflicts 1d4 HP fire or creature-specific damage in a 10' emanation around the summoned creature
Forcible Energy: (1) Subsequent spell that inflicts energy damage also inflicts weakness 5 to that damage type on 1 target until the end of the next turn
Form Retention: Can prepare battle polymorph spells that last for 10 min by using a slot 2 ranks higher than normal
Infinite Possibilities: Can prepare a spell slot to allow the casting of any known spell of at least 2 ranks lower
Irresistible Magic: Reduces any target status bonus to saves vs. self spells by 1
Keen Magical Detection: Use of the Detect Magic exploration activity gives the better of 2 initiative rolls vs. foes that have magic active
Linked Focus: Draining a bonded item to cast a school spell restores 1 Focus Point once per day
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-rank Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-rank during Seek
Nonlethal Spell: (1) Changes the damage caused by a subsequent spell to non-lethal
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: Can cause a successful Counterspell to inflict the spell effects on the caster
Reprepare Spell: Can spend 10 min to prepare a previously-cast instantaneous spell of up to 4th rank or another instantaneous spell of the same rank
School Of Unified Magical Theory: Can use Drain Bonded Item once per spell rank each day
Scintillating Spell: (1) Targets that fail a Reflex save vs. a subsequent instantaneous non-darkness spell also suffer dazzled for 1 rd, or blinded for 1 rd on a critical failure
Scroll Adept: Can prepare 4 temporary scrolls with spells up to level 7 during daily prep
Second Thoughts: (R) Triggering critical save by the target of a single-target mental spell allows redirecting it before the end of the next turn without expending an additional spell slot
Secondary Detonation Array: (1) Subsequent instantaneous area damage spell inflicts an additional 1d6 HP force or the spell's damage type (save basic Reflex) in a 5' burst within its area of effect at the beginning of the next turn
Spell Blending: Can use 2 spell slots from a rank to prepare a spell up to 2 ranks higher or use a spell slot to prepare 2 cantrips
Spell Combination: Can prepare a spell slot of each rank above 2nd to cast a combination of 2 spells of 2 ranks lower
Spell Mastery: Can cast 4 chosen spells of different ranks once each day without preparation; can change the spell selection with 1 week of downtime
Spell Protection Array: (1) R30' 5' burst gives +1 saves vs. magic while sustained for up to 1 min
Spell Substitution: Can use a 10-min process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Spell Tinker: (2) Alters a choice of an ongoing effect from a spell cast on self
Spellshape Mastery: Can use 1-action spellshape effects as free actions
Split Slot: Can cast either of 2 prepared spells from a slot up to rank 8
Staff Nexus: Can cast a chosen cantrip and a chosen 1st-rank spell from a staff that contains charges equal to the total ranks of 3 spells expended during daily prep
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Superior Bond: Can use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell of up to rank 7 once per day
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Wizard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
